title: Tiefling
entryLore: Tieflings are mortals with a touch of the fiendish in their bloodline. Tracing their ancestry to the Lower Planes, they possess unique physical traits and supernatural abilities granted by their Fiendish Legacyâ€”a connection they can choose to embrace or define themselves against. They are often marked by horns, tails, or unusual skin colors, reflecting their otherworldly heritage.

traits.name: Darkvision
traits.description: You have [[darkvision|Darkvision]] with a range of 60 feet.

markdown:
### Fiendish Legacies
Your tiefling bloodline is tied to one of the Lower Planes. Choose one of the following legacies to gain specific magical benefits:

*   [[abyssal_tiefling|Abyssal (Chaotic)]]
*   [[chthonic_tiefling|Chthonic (Neutral)]]
*   [[infernal_tiefling|Infernal (Lawful)]]
